title: Day after 24-year-old woman raped near Hauz Khas Village, Delhi Police detains six men | delhi | Hindustan Times
text:
Day after 24-year-old woman raped near Hauz Khas Village, Delhi Police detains six men delhi Updated: Feb 20, 2017 10:19 IST Ananya Bhardwaj Hindustan Times The woman was reportedly returning home with a cousin after dinner at a restaurant in Hauz Khas Village, when she was taken to Deer Park (in picture) by a man who offered to show her a lake.(Arun Sharma/HT Photo) 
A day after a 24-year-old student from Nagaland was allegedly raped inside south Delhi’s Deer Park around 2 am on Sunday, the police have detained six men in connection with the case. 
The woman was reportedly returning home with a cousin after dinner at a restaurant in Hauz Khas Village, when she was taken to the park by a man who offered to show her a lake. 
The woman said in her complaint that the man, who she couldn’t identify, raped her twice at the park adjacent to the Capital’s signature hangout zone with 48 restaurants, art galleries and designer boutiques. The two cousins, who stay at a rented flat in south Delhi, had gone to Hauz Khas with friends on Saturday night. After dinner, around 1am, the two women were trying to hail a cab to return home when two men approached them. 
“We have detained six men and are questioning them. We hope to make the arrests soon,” an investigator said. 
The police teams area recording statements of eyewitnesses in the case. “Our teams are speaking to vendors, parking attendants, security guards, who had seen the women walking with the two men. We have got crucial leads and an arrest will be made soon,” a police officer said. 
The police have recovered the wallet of the victim from the spot where she was allegedly raped. A CCTV camera installed near the market has also captured the suspect’s friend chatting with the cousin, who went home leaving her sister behind. tags
